relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Natural 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis blackout luxe natural vertical blind is a stunning addition for any family home or office. The adjustability of the vertical slats is perfect for creating your ideal light levels at any time of day, resulting in a peaceful environment that is conducive for both work and relaxation. The blackout slats are made from practical waterproof material and are presented in this warm and versatile natural tone.

relproducts.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Graphite 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Chic and contemporary, the genesis blackout luxe graphite vertical blind is sure to make an impact in any room. This highly practical design featuring vertical slats offers you complete control over glare and light filtration in your space, plus in this smart graphite colour, it looks really attractive too. The durable vertical slats boast blackout qualities so this blind can be enjoyed in many areas of your home.

relproducts.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Cloud 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis blackout luxe cloud vertical blind is both streamlined and graceful so you can add some subtle contemporary style to your window space. This practical vertical blind will prove useful in a range of rooms and offers you complete flexibility thanks to the tilting vertical slats and blackout material. Coloured in a soft blue-grey hue, this vertical blind is easy to incorporate in both traditional and more minimalist interiors.
